description:
Be Happy Now Using Simple NLP Techniques is a course that teaches you simple , small and powerful techniques to change your mood instantly and be happy immediately. By taking this course you will be able to be happy whenever you want. Happiness will be at your finger tips . This course not only teaches you to be happy but also helps you spread happiness among your loved ones.

Simple techniques like anchoring , modelling , changing your inner voice are explained to help you overcome sadness and depression .

This course includes-

    • Section 1: Introduction
    • Lecture 1: Introduction To The Course
    • Section 2: Be Happy Now Using Simple NLP Techniques
    • Lecture 2: Learn to activate the state of happiness in your body
    • Lecture 3: Learn to improve your body postures
    • Lecture 4: Modelling technique to become happy
    • Lecture 5: Learning to be happy using anchoring and mind triggers
    • Lecture 6: Change your words and be happy instantly
    • Section 3: Conclusion
    • Lecture 7: Summary of the course
title: Be Happy Now Using Simple NLP Techniques
